Description:
Pristine and Positioned to Please
Fantastic lifestyle/investment opportunity located in a popular pocket of Coburg, this immaculate two bedroom villa unit delivers extraordinary low-maintenance living. Part of a tightly held complex, this pristine property showcasing hardwood floors, features spacious living with an excellent kitchen. A private rear incorporating paved alfresco for relaxed outdoor living. Double bedrooms with BIR's enjoy a central bathroom, while heating, cooling, single garage complete this unique property, enviably positioned to lively Sydney Road as well as the Melville road tram.
Insights: 4/2 Willow Grove, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Three Frontages, Ultimate Versatility - Development Potential STCA
Set within the coveted Strathmore Secondary College zone just walking distance to Melville Road tram, schools and Shore Reserve, this two bedroom California Bungalow is placed for lifestyle and sure to appeal to families, couples, renovators, investors and developers. A classic façade with traditional porch and leadlight windows reveals an interior framed by high ceilings. Open lounge/dining rooms feature original fireplaces and flow to the kitchen/meals zone with a covered outdoor entertaining area beyond. Two substantial bedrooms include one with kitchenette, prompting ensuite conversion. There's also a large garage/workshop. Three frontages result from a corner position plus a rear ROW, providing versatility moving forward and excellent off street parking potential. It's poised for restoration or alternatively leave the front home leased out whilst getting plans and permits for the new rear home with its own street frontage or superb new home site (STCA).
Agent: Ray White Coburg
Insights: 52 Gordon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming Lifestyle & Locale
SALE BY SET DATE Closing 7th August 2018 at 6pm
Recently updated this light bright spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment offers the occupier a great lifestyle opportunity in a thriving location. Situated with only a moments' walk to the cosmopolitan Sydney Road shopping, café & restaurant precinct along with numerous transport options only a short distance away makes this a great opportunity whether you are a first home buyer or investor.
The apartment features the following:
- 2 bedrooms both with large BIR's
- Modern bathroom with shower over bath, separate laundry trough and washing machine stop sets (suitable for both front and top loader washing machine - with space for dryer above)
- Separate Toilet
- Open plan kitchen meals area
- Kitchen – plenty of storage including full length pantry, electric cooktop, DWS
- Spacious living area leading onto balcony
This is definitely a unique opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 5/50-66 Reynard Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Class for A Cosmopolitan Lifestyle
Contemporary, stylish and showcasing a clever floorplan plus the highest quality fittings and fixtures throughout, this spacious top floor apartment enjoys a wide-open vista of Merri Creek and city views from its premier position on the fourth floor 'penthouse level'. Ideal for those looking to enter the market, invest wisely or downsize. It's two spacious and light filled bedrooms each featuring a mirrored built in robe, whilst a light filled open plan kitchen/lounge zone provides plenty of room for everyday living and adjoins a private balcony, the ideal place to entertain. A study nook is a great place to work whilst a stunning ultra-modern French laundry / central bathroom services the apartment superbly. Additional features include quality fittings, granite kitchen benchtop, dishwasher, split system heating/cooling, individual heating units in bedrooms, security intercom, a secure undercover car space and private storage area on title. Lift access to the apartment is only to the allocated floor for added security. Located only 8km approx. from the CBD and a short stroll from Sydney road shopping, tramline, Coburg train station, market, cafes, Coburg Leisure Centre and parks. This is one opportunity that is not to be missed!
Insights: 407/19 Pentridge Boulevard, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture perfect haven
A superb fusion of old and new, this distinctive two bedroom Edwardian on a corner block of approx 400sqm, boasts soaring ceilings, a free flowing floorplan and effortless outdoor entertaining. Ornate ceilings, wainscoting and decorative fireplaces adorn gracefully proportioned bedrooms and spacious living and dining where picture windows flood the area in natural light. A dramatic black and beech two-tone kitchen featuring Smeg appliances and exceptional storage flows to the covered alfresco deck and established gardens for relaxed entertaining. Potter among the raised vegetable beds, walk to Sydney Road cafes, shops and trams or enjoy Merri Creek parklands, the best of Coburg is within easy reach. Add to this a neat bathroom, ducted heating, alarm, solar panels and carport with remote door, inspection will impress.
Insights: 15 Coburg Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY 28/07 AT 2PM
Step up and take this two bedroom plus study Californian Bungalow on approximately 526m2 into the future. High ceilings and polished floorboards work with a flexible floor plan currently flaunting a large living room, adjoining dining domain with open fireplace, kitchen/meals and double bedrooms, with built-in robes, sharing a central bathroom. Outdoors a covered area, workshop and big rear garden await and parking is taken care of by a long side driveway. Situated in a pleasant, tree lined street and completed by ducted heating, this home has abundant scope for savvy enhancements or you may wish to try something completely new (subject to council approval). Transport, playgrounds and primary schools are a stroll plus Coburg Market and Sydney Road nearby.
Insights: 34 Preston Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Under Offer
Secluded Style with Indoor/Outdoor Space!. One of only four on the block, this two-storey rear townhouse delivers an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity with its impressive dimensions, quality enhancements and prime position just north of Brunswick's border. Filled with natural light, the home's feature-packed interior boasts three bedrooms (large master with WIR and private balcony), contemporary-style bathroom and two separate WCs (one on each level). Add to this a spacious lounge leading through to the open dining area and stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher. Other stand-out features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, additional split-system a/c, (lounge), full-size laundry and internally-accessed garage, plus French doors (from the dining area) with a fabulous entertaining deck and wonderfully large backyard garden with northerly aspect. Moreland Road buses at the end of the street, it's also close to the area's renowned primary schools, Melville Road trams and Moreland Station, Citylink, as well as easy access to Sydney Road cafes and shops. Easy-living excellence!
Insights: 4/33 Shaftsbury Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 3 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Larger Than Meets The Eye !!
This spacious two-storey, three bedroom home features two powder rooms, stylish two-pack kitchen, large lounge, and is close to almost everything! Central bathroom includes spa, shower, and vanity, with the upstairs housing two queen sized bedrooms, a study area, and king-size master with walk-in robe, ensuite, and balcony access. Store everything you need in the shed, surrounded by beautiful large courtyard. Also features:
- Floorboards throughout lower level
- 600mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher
- Cupboards and storage under the stairs
- Single car remote garage
- Walking distance to Coburg High School and Batman Railway Station
- No body corporate fees
- All bedrooms feature built-in robes
- Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling
Only a few minutes walk away from Sydney Road shops, schools, trams, and amenties, this property will delight families, couples, or investors looking for an inner suburban home that has the lot. Call our agent Mario Pejovski on 0490815914 to book your viewing today.
Insights: 13A Ohea Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Superb Sense of Space!
Sublimely proportioned for a two bedroom home, this contemporary residence in a boutique development in an appealing street, is stylishly appointed and offers elegant outdoor space. Stainless steel Blanco appliances meet with stone splashbacks and countertops in the luxuriously large kitchen/dining/living, where a sliding glass door leads to a delightful courtyard with large covered entertaining area and garden beds. Double bedrooms include a supremely proportioned main with WIR and second bedroom with BIR; there's an open study with fitted desk and further features include a central bathroom with relaxing bath and separate shower, powder room, polished floorboards, central heating, cooling, security system, rainwater tank and automatic garage with courtyard access. Robinson Reserve, trains, Coburg Market and Sydney Road are all within a stroll.

Description:
Amazing Family Home!
Surprising double storey home provides an idyllic inner-urban environment with its first-class features and outstanding family flexibility. Immaculate throughout, the home's spacious interior boasts four bedrooms (extra-large master with WIR and deluxe ensuite), study, equally-stylish main bathroom and separate powder room. Dual living zones include an elegant formal lounge complete with built-in cupboards/bookcases, light-filled open living/dining area complemented by a superb stone-bench kitchen with mirrored splashbacks, walk-in pantry and Bosch/Miele appliances. Other highlights include ducted heating (zoned) and evaporative cooling, high ceilings and solid timber floors, soft-close drawers (kitchen and bathrooms), solar power, large laundry and under-stair storeroom. Bi-folds (from the living area) reveal a wonderfully wide undercover entertaining deck, sizeable backyard garden with handy storage shed and sideway watertank, plus the added advantage of a gated off-street parking space. Walking distance to Batman Station, O'Hea Street buses and Sydney Road trams, it's also close to primary and secondary schools, Coburg Lake, local cafes and Coburg's renowned shopping precinct. Perfect family lifestyle! Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Secluded Style on Brunswick's Border
Tucked away at the rear (one of only four), this contemporary villa delivers a perfect low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity with its spacious floorplan, impressive features and enviable inner-urban location. Filled with natural light, the home's as-new interior comprises three double bedrooms (master with WIR and stylish ensuite), main bathroom and oversized open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a stone-bench kitchen with tiled splashbacks and stainless steel appliances. Ducted heating and split-system air conditioning add to the appeal, along with polished hardwood floors, European laundry and remote-control double garage, plus a delightful north-facing courtyard complete with undercover patio. Moreland Road buses at the end of the street, it's also close to the area's renowned primary schools, Melville Road trams and Moreland Station, Citylink, as well as easy access to Sydney Road cafes and shops. Easy-living excellence!

Description:
Under offer
An outstanding opportunity in a quiet cul-de-sac located just a leisurely stroll from the multicultural delights of Sydney Road and transport. Step inside and be impressed with great living spaces and a fantastic outdoor space perfect for all occasions which will make entertaining or relaxing a breeze.
Features include:
- Central lounge with gas log fire
- Rear garden, perfect for entertaining or the kids to play in
- Three generous bedrooms
- Polished floorboards feature in living areas
- Spacious kitchen with island bench
- Great dining space
- Off-street parking
- Low maintenance living
Get to know Coburg
Coburg is a multicultural hub of Melbourne’s inner north. Be inspired with the mix of cuisines, cafes and pubs on offer along Sydney Road. Get involved with the Moreland BUG (Bicycle User Group), East/West use O’Hea Street cycling and walking track and North/South Upfield bike path or the Merri Creek trail. The Coburg Velodrome (Coburg North) also hosts a number of food truck festivals and cinema nights. Great public transport with two train stations and three tram lines - getting in and around Melbourne could not be easier. Families. Cuisine. Sports. Welcome to Coburg.
Insights: 9 Methven Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand-New Designer Living with Every Indulgence
With its intelligent architecture, floorplan flexibility and luxurious appointments throughout, this fully-optioned home delivers an exclusive environment of cutting-edge style and enviable inner-urban convenience. With its own street frontage and no shared land, the home's meticulously-detailed interior boasts four bedrooms (all with designer mirrored robes) and dedicated study with built-in workstation, deluxe ensuite, main bathroom and two powder rooms (one on each level) - all with floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this an expansive open-plan living/dining area complemented by a gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops and splashbacks, ample cupboard space, Smeg 900mm cooking appliances, integrated microwave oven and dishwasher. Other premium features include heating and cooling throughout, comprehensive security system (alarm, video intercom and CCTV), ducted vacuum, American Oak solid timber floors and soft-close cabinetry, full-size laundry and under-stair storeroom. Double-glazed stacker doors (from the living area) reveal a sunny rear courtyard complete with Blackbutt entertaining deck, synthetic turf and permitter gardens, plus the added advantage of an internally-accessed garage (remote-controlled) and additional driveway parking space. Well south of Bell Street, the best of Coburg is at your fingertips including trains, trams and buses, renowned shops and major supermarkets, cafes and restaurants, as well as easy access to local parks and schools.
Insights: 1a Mayfield Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Super Start Or Intelligent Investment
Set in a prized residential development within an iconic Coburg pocket, this designer inspired 4th floor apartment enjoys easy access to Coburg Lake and the tram and eclectic mix of cafes and restaurants lining cosmopolitan Sydney Road.
The spacious open plan living stretches from a stainless steel equipped kitchen with glossy tiled splash back to a balcony big enough for a BBQ and a spot of quiet reflection on a warm night. The double bedroom with built in robe is served by the adjacent bathroom, large enough to include the convenience of laundry facilities. With café close by, secure video entry, lift and remote door access to an underground car space, it delivers stylish living in a super spot.

Description:
Boundless Potential, Position Perfect
Proudly positioned in a coveted Coburg address, this solid brick three bedroom home on approximately 460m2 is ready for you to take it to the next level. Look beyond the sturdy bones of this single level home and discover boundless potential, perfectly matched by a family friendly location boasting St Fidelis and Coburg West Primary Schools, Coburg Train Station, parks, vibrant Sydney Road shopping and cafes, Melville Road trams and CityLink access within easy reach. Immediately comfortable the property showcases high ornate ceilings and grand proportions of its Californian Bungalow beginnings, this spacious home features a wide entrance hall flanked by a free flowing living domain comprising lounge, dining and a quality fitted solid timber kitchen, and large double bedrooms serviced by a neat bathroom.
The sunny rear garden incorporates a versatile bungalow and presents ample space in which to entertain, while extras include gas heating and a long side drive to a large single garage offering copious off street parking.

Description:
Original Period Gem With Outstanding Potential
Overflowing with original period features, this character filled three bedroom timber Californian Bungalow is set on a large parcel of land measuring approximately 760sqm. Ideal for period home renovators the property offers enormous scope for a complete restoration, inspired renovation and modern extension. Meanwhile new home builders and investors will be excited by its abundance of natural asset, wide street frontage and future development potential (STCA). Whilst in need of TLC, an original layout, comprising hallway, spacious lounge, separate kitchen/meals, three bedrooms and central bathroom, features stunning leadlight aspects, high ceilings, decorative plasterwork/fretwork, open fireplaces, timber panelling/plate rails and well-preserved natural timber floors underfoot. Within walking distance to St Bernard's primary, Antonine College, Coburg shops, markets, parks and city transport.
Agent: Ray White Coburg
Insights: 1 Patterson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Bright Living Amongst The Community Spirited
An attractive facade, sundrenched living and location renowned for its sense of community only increases the appeal of this delightful two bedroom Edwardian. Positioned in one of Coburg's leafier streets on a substantial allotment of approx. 318m2, a short stroll to vibrant Sydney Road shopping and cafes, numerous tram lines, Moreland Station, Upfield Bike Path, schools and parks, it presents the best in urban living. Showcasing lofty ceilings and leadlight panel details, this traditional home features a long entrance hall introducing bedrooms with mirrored robes and formal living room before giving way to bright open plan living. Bathed in natural light this charming area presents a neat well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and spills to a deep north-facing garden offering relaxed outdoor entertaining and/or room for future enhancement or extension, STCA. Comfort and cottage appeal continue through timber floors, a neat bathroom, separate laundry and split system heating/cooling.
Insights: 45 Blair Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT FOR YOUNG FAMILIES
Enjoy the convenience of this comfortable townhouse that offers a relaxing lifestyle in a location moments from Merri Creek trails and parklands.
Comprising: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious open plan living areas, downstairs powder room, internal laundry and side drive leading to a lock-up carport/garage.
Features include: Floating floor boards, granite kitchen bench top, 2 toilets, large backyard timber decking, electric panel heating, built in robes and upstairs balcony,
Located close to all schools, Village Shopping Precinct, recreational parklands and only 250 metres away from Nicholson Street tram.

Description:
Modern Living In Parkland Precinct
With the best of everything Coburg has to offer virtually on its doorstep, this contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom tri-level residence promises convenient city living within a safe, secure environment. Designed with low maintenance qualities a priority, the home is well-suited for professional couples and astute investors after a relaxed, yet vibrant, lifestyle close to city attractions and the CBD. A bright and airy layout begins with separate entry/cupboard leading to light filled, open concept kitchen, meals and living spaces flowing onto an alfresco balcony bathed in afternoon sunlight. Appointed with stainless steel appliances, stone counters and abundant cabinetry, the modern two-tone kitchen ensures appeal for aspiring home cooks. Two similar sized double bedrooms link directly to their own private bathroom, each has either built-in-robe or walk-through-robe. Features include ducted heating, split-system, powder room, European laundry and secured rear driveway accessing an automated garage with direct internal home entry. Close to Coburg Lake Reserve, cafes, shops, markets and public transport.
Insights: 34 Woiwurung Crescent, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLD
This single fronted period charmer is sure to please growing families or savvy investors alike. It features high ceilings, picture rails, a period fireplace, polished floorboards, ducted heating & split system cooling. Three bedrooms provide ample accomodation, whilst a formal dining room leads to a central well-equipped kitchen overlooking a meals area. Those who like to entertain are sure to make avid use of the low maintenance rear yard, whilst off street parking for one car is provided via right of way access. Liveable now, it also provides excellent future potential for your own renovations/enhancements as time goes by. Currently leased until January 2019, it is returning $1868 per calendar month. This outstanding package is made complete by its 'blue ribbon' position, only moments to Sydney Rd. shopping/cafes, Coburg Train Station, West Coburg Primary School, Coburg North Village & The Melville Road Tram.
Insights: 31 Wellington Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.
